issue.title: [CF 1441] Feature Suggestion: Encounter ID Condition
issue.body:
I would like to see an Encounter ID condition to make it easier to activate icons/groups for certain bosses.

Similar to weak aura's load on Encounter ID.

 

Thanks for the great addon =D


> Posted by CurseForge user b00gyman | Imported from CurseForge issue #1441 | Raw

comments.body:
You can basically do the same thing with the Unit is Unit condition, IE Boss1 is Kil'jaeden


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Use the BigWigs or DBM "Boss Engaged" conditions.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
